all_findings.title: Unprotected Owner Change
all_findings.description: Function `transferOwnership()` changes ownership without onlyOwner protection. Anyone can take control of the contract. Critical vulnerability.

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Potential Taint Flow in transferOwnership
all_findings.description: Untrusted input (msg.sender) may reach sensitive operation (transfer, send) without proper validation

provenance.fix_suggestion: Add require() or assert() to validate input before sensitive operations

all_findings.title: Sandwich attack vulnerability - no slippage protection
all_findings.description: Swap at line 40 lacks slippage protection (sandwich attack vector)

evidence.recommendation: Add minAmountOut parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: MEV vulnerability - sandwich attack
all_findings.description: Swap at line 40 lacks slippage protection

evidence.recommendation: Add minAmountOut parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: Swap without slippage protection
all_findings.description: Swap at line 40 vulnerable to slippage manipulation

evidence.recommendation: Add amountOutMin parameter for slippage protection

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on transferOwnership()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function transferOwnership(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

all_findings.title: Modifier with external call - reentrancy risk
all_findings.description: Modifier at line 24 contains external call

evidence.recommendation: Avoid external calls in modifiers or use reentrancy guard

all_findings.title: Potential Front-Running Vulnerability
all_findings.description: Line 38: Function may be vulnerable to front-running. Consider adding deadline and slippage protection.

all_findings.title: Potential Front-Running Vulnerability
all_findings.description: Line 48: Function may be vulnerable to front-running. Consider adding deadline and slippage protection.

evidence.line: function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public virtual requiresAuth {

all_findings.description: Line 63: Function may be vulnerable to front-running. Consider adding deadline and slippage protection.

all_findings.title: Potential Taint Flow in setAuthority
all_findings.description: Untrusted input (msg.sender) may reach sensitive operation (send, call) without proper validation

provenance.fix_suggestion: Add require() or assert() to validate input before sensitive operations

all_findings.title: DEX operation without deadline
all_findings.description: Operation at line 40 has no deadline parameter

evidence.recommendation: Add deadline parameter to prevent stale transactions

all_findings.title: Missing NatSpec @notice for function 'setAuthority'
all_findings.description: Add a NatSpec @notice describing the purpose and effects.

all_findings.title: Missing NatSpec @notice for function 'transferOwnership'
all_findings.description: Add a NatSpec @notice describing the purpose and effects.

all_findings.title: Missing NatSpec @notice for modifier 'requiresAuth'
all_findings.description: Add a NatSpec @notice describing the purpose and effects.

all_findings.title: Missing NatSpec @dev for function 'setAuthority'
all_findings.description: Add a @dev section describing technical details/notes.

all_findings.title: Missing NatSpec @dev for function 'transferOwnership'
all_findings.description: Add a @dev section describing technical details/notes.

all_findings.title: Missing NatSpec for public variable 'owner'
all_findings.description: Add a NatSpec line (/// @notice ...) above the public state variable.

all_findings.title: Missing NatSpec for public variable 'authority'
all_findings.description: Add a NatSpec line (/// @notice ...) above the public state variable.

all_findings.title: Struct field ordering may be inefficient
all_findings.description: Struct at line 16 should pack fields for gas efficiency

evidence.recommendation: Order fields: larger types first, pack smaller types

all_findings.title: Modifier adds gas overhead
all_findings.description: Modifier at line 24 adds deployment gas

evidence.recommendation: Consider inlining simple modifiers if used only once

all_findings.title: Use custom errors instead of require strings
all_findings.description: Require with string at line 25 wastes deployment gas

evidence.gas_saved: ~50 gas per call, significant deployment savings
evidence.recommendation: Use custom error: error MyError(); revert MyError();

all_findings.title: Variable set in constructor should be immutable
all_findings.description: Variable at line 35 could be immutable

evidence.recommendation: Declare as immutable if only set in constructor

all_findings.title: Variable set in constructor should be immutable
all_findings.description: Variable at line 41 could be immutable

evidence.recommendation: Declare as immutable if only set in constructor

all_findings.title: Missing @param documentation for function parameters
all_findings.description: Function at line 38 has parameters but no @param documentation

evidence.recommendation: Add @param for each function parameter

all_findings.title: Missing @param documentation for function parameters
all_findings.description: Function at line 48 has parameters but no @param documentation

evidence.recommendation: Add @param for each function parameter

all_findings.title: Commented out code detected
all_findings.description: Line 34 appears to be commented out code

evidence.recommendation: Remove commented out code or uncomment if needed

all_findings.title: Missing explicit function visibility
all_findings.description: Function at line 34 should have explicit visibility

evidence.recommendation: Add public/private/internal/external

all_findings.title: Complex boolean expression needs comment
all_findings.description: Complex condition at line 35 should be documented

evidence.recommendation: Add inline comment explaining the logic

all_findings.title: Missing explicit function visibility
all_findings.description: Function at line 35 should have explicit visibility

evidence.recommendation: Add public/private/internal/external

all_findings.title: Public function could be external
all_findings.description: Function at line 38 is public but appears to only be called externally

evidence.recommendation: Change visibility to external to save gas

all_findings.title: Public function could be external
all_findings.description: Function at line 48 is public but appears to only be called externally

evidence.recommendation: Change visibility to external to save gas

all_findings.title: Missing documentation for modifier requiresAuth
all_findings.description: Modifier at line 24 lacks NatSpec documentation

evidence.recommendation: Add @dev or @notice explaining the modifier purpose

all_findings.title: Missing @notice/@dev for public function setAuthority
all_findings.description: Public/external function at line 38 lacks NatSpec documentation

evidence.recommendation: Add @notice explaining what the function does

all_findings.title: Missing @notice/@dev for public function transferOwnership
all_findings.description: Public/external function at line 48 lacks NatSpec documentation

evidence.recommendation: Add @notice explaining what the function does

all_findings.title: Multiple consecutive empty lines
all_findings.description: Multiple empty lines at line 66

evidence.recommendation: Use single empty line for separation

all_fixes.explanation: Added onlyOwner modifier to critical function
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function setAuthority(Authority newAuthority) public virtual 
+ function setAuthority(Authority newAuthority) public onlyOwner virtual

all_fixes.explanation: Added onlyOwner modifier to critical function
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public virtual requiresAuth 
+ function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public onlyOwner virtual requiresAuth

all_fixes.explanation: Consider making owner immutable if set only in constructor (saves ~2100 gas per read)
